website_summaries.verdict: The perfect budget-friendly choice for an effective tea tree shampoo. Especially effective on thick hair.
pros: We were impressed with how hydrating the OXG shampoo really was
You could even get away with not using conditioner
The texture of the product is extra thick, almost like a jelly, and a little goes a long way
We love how it reduces frizz and flyaways after the first use
Provides instant relief of itchy scalp
cons: The tea tree and mint scent doesn't really come through

customer_reviews.title: Not really sulfate free....
customer_reviews.text: Check resources before buying this. Other sites say to beware of products with Stay away from products that claim to be sulfate-free but contain the following ingredients: Cocamide DEA Cocamide MEA PEG’s, PEG8 Propylene Glycol Cocamidopropyl Betaine Hydroxysultain This has those!
customer_reviews.author: MeganG

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I found it on pinterest. Someone said it was a great shampoo for itchy scalps. I go through very itchy periods for some reason. It was getting really bad when I found this shampoo and decided to give it a try. I have tried many other shampoos and conditioners from this same brand and I love them all. This one was no exception. It really has helped my itchy scalp tremendously. I've really been very happy with this shampoo and this brand overall. Very highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi W.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, but then my scalp started to itch and burn. It seems to leave a coating on my hair that lingers. It drives my scalp and face crazy. The itch is awful!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very drying shampoo unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The smell is sweet and lovely, I enjoyed it a lot. At home I always get organic, natural shampoos (that sometimes indeed don't wash well everytime, it's a hit or miss situation with "natural" shampoos) but I'm traveling and couldn't get my hands on my usual brand so tried this I've had it for about a month and finally connected the dots with why, for the first time in my life, the ends of my hair look dry... Nothing else has changed and I use a tiny amount to shampoo+ only on my roots but it still affects the lower parts of my hair, esp. right after washing, I'm not the only one reporting this. Quite disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Lala DC

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye dry, scalp and dandruff
customer_reviews.text: It’s unbelievable not having dandruff. I tried every shampoo and conditioner meant to get rid of dandruff and this mixed with its conditioner counterpart left me speechless. Not one flake after one shower. I just bought it because tea-tree seems like a miracle ingredient and indeed it is. No itchiness or dandruff for the first time ever and my scalp doesn’t feel tight and dry for the first time. It feels free, refreshed and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Dude, where’s my mint? Where’s your mint, dude?
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I bought this after using another tea tree and mint oil product that gave me the refreshing feeling that you expect from hair products with mint. This one didn’t have that and I’m disappointed. Without that mint aspect, it’s just a regular shampoo by this company
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo for the first time last week and my scalp has not stopped itching. I have never felt anything like this and I have lots of small little red bumps throughout my head and my hairline. I must be allergic to this as this is the only new product I introduced into my haircare regime.
customer_reviews.author: Prolificdiva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo with an excellent scent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the conditioner and shampoo together from Amazon and they were delivered within 36 hours. Almost immediately, the package was stolen from my front door. Amazon was wonderful and sent out a replacement and told me if we find the original we could keep it! Go Amazon! Hooray! As for the shampoo and conditioner, these are an amazing brand with a terrific scent! The scent is invigorating when you're showering in the morning, it softens your hair nicely and doesn't weigh it down too much, and a little goes a long way. OGX is a great brand and I will be buying these sets for a long time to come!
customer_reviews.author: Denise L

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitivity to shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sensitive child's hair. He was getting sores from using sauve. This cleared him right up. Great smell too! And I read that school age kids should use tea tree in their shampoo because it keeps lice away. So awesome all around. Great add on price. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BARELY smells like tea tree or mint and there is ZERO tingle ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely, BARELY smells like tea tree or mint and there is ZERO tingle as with the salon tea tree shampoo. Major bummer. Probably washes hair just as well as anything else, but I wanted to FEEL like I washed my hair with tea tree. Meh. Might as well use $2.00 Suave. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L. Cravens

customer_reviews.title: Works great on scalp dermatitis/psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: First wash and the scaly, flaky plaque on the back of my neck and ears melted away to baby smooth skin. 24 hours after wash, it's still smooth. Since usually the scaliness comes back within 24 hours of my wash with other brands, I'm giving this 5 stars for effectiveness & scent
customer_reviews.author: wildfaeries

customer_reviews.title: Great option for you
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding just the right shampoo for my long, ultra fine, super dry hair and oily scalp (such a fun combination isn't it?). I've tried so many EXPENSIVE brands and I really do like, but decided to branch out and try something else. I found this and love the combo of mint and tea tree so I decided to give it a whirl. I'm still using it and loving it, especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Here

customer_reviews.title: TeaTree Mint Shampoo for skin condition
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo I use for rosacea and blepharitis problems. I treated the blepharitis per eye doctor's directions for years and nothing worked. A lot of trouble for nothing! Then researched it online and found some doctors recommend tea tree oil facial wash and tea tree oil shampoo. This works! The shampoo is also great for my fine, dry hair. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Customer # 10

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t feel/smell any tea tree or mint!
customer_reviews.text: Received product and tried right away this morning. Extremely disappointed! Not ANY semblance of tea tree or mint smell or sensation on my scalp. In contrast, the matching conditioner had a pleasant tea tree/mint smell and tingling sensation on my scalp - which is the whole purpose of buying this product! So am returning it. Which is a pain. I don’t care how lovely the bottle is and how inexpensive the shampoo is. Not as advertised. And inexplicable as the conditioner appears to be fine. Was it a bad batch? Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I started getting an itchy scalp and had some dryness in fall/early winter. I read Tea Tree helps a lot. I didn’t want to spend a lot on just Tea Tree shampoo so I tried this one with mint and it worked great. I usually wash my hair 2-3 times a week and within a week the dryness and itchiness disappeared. I’ve always loved this brand! The smell is also very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: ☕🌳 almost a hint of a tea tree tingle
customer_reviews.text: I am tempted to purchaseto amp up this "tea tree" shampoo. The intensity of mint is similarly underwhelming. On the upside it really is shampoo not that hippie frippery without a soap or surfactant component. This "moisturizing" shampoo savagely dries my hair compared to. If I don't also use a conditioner this leaves my hair frizzy, and uncooperative even when usinghair gel. I shall not buy it again. If you have EXTREMELY oily hair then this might suit you.
customer_reviews.author: 🛡️ veracity 🛡️

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily hair

I was excited to try this, but it was a waste of money. I had to shampoo my hair twice and each time felt like it was adding more buildup on top rather than removing the oiliness, in the end I had to use another shampoo to wash all of the buildup. Usually "moisturizing" shampoos don't help oily hair so I would stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Martyna

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair dry and brittle

I bought this because I've have a year old perm and I wanted something that could put some hydration and moisture back to my hair. I'm almost done with the bottle and my hair has never felt more brittle. I think this shampoo slowly sucked my hair dry. I would not recommend this if you're looking for something to make your anything other than dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tenchi

customer_reviews.title: Smells yum!

I have used it with the argon oil conditioner (blue bottle) and look forward to using it with the coconut milk conditioner (white bottle) next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling shampoo

I usually use the same brand & scent conditioner and that gives my hair an extra boost of scent while keeping down static. The scent isn’t overpowering, though. Overall, I like this shampoo a lot. I do also use and recommend other formulas from this brand. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it...but......

However, I guess it was definitely wishful thinking on my part to think that it would come close to Paul Mitchell's........which it does NOTTT. This shampoo just smells nice but didn't give me the fresh, tingly, minty feel like the professional salon quality one. I was just hoping that I would be able to save by getting this, but it just simply doesn't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

However I noticed that it made my hair feel greasy/oily. And not soft feeling. My hair was just not feeling clean with this shampoo. It was odd. I wanted to love it, but it did not agree with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

This does not seem "clarifying" as I expected, but it cleans well, smells pleasant, is nicely moisturizing. I will purchase again because it's a good price.
customer_reviews.author: MGW

It did feel moisturizing and smelled good but other than that it did not improve or fix anything. If you have a dry itchy scalp you should purchase something stronger in my case I will not buy again.

Also, the top was broken and leaking from the bag but that did not bother me that much, only a little spilled.

Gave it to a friend and she seems happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for about two months now with consistently good results. I will say I think my hair ...

I will say I think my hair tangles more in the shower, but it's not a big enough problem for me to downgrade my rating.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell

customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!

customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this product is not the same as when I have bought it in the drugstore & from other sellers

I may just not remember, but for the least few years it has been clear. It smells minty, but as you wash it away it has a much harsher chemical smell I have never noticed with this product. It doesn't leave my hair feeling as soft. I think it is a fake item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever! Better living through chemistry!

customer_reviews.author: finetunes

customer_reviews.title: The BEST shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece at first, but after she told me how good it was I went to meijer and bought myself some ( I actually use the extra strength version).. This shampoo is AMAZING. I have really thick, wavy hair and dry scalp, and this shampoo has eliminated dry scalp, and I never have tangles in my hair anymore. This shampoo/ is honestly working miracles and I recommend it to someone whenever I get the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: MINTY, BUT WITH A SINGLE FATAL FLAW

BUT- here's the rub: if you're looking for a mint shampoo that leaves your head feeling all tingly like a bunch of pixies are having a dance-off up in your glorious locks.. then keep looking. Either way, as a guy, a little dab goes a long way and my hair feels fresh and clean with it. Good price too, and it’s probably natural ingredients based on their name.

customer_reviews.title: This Shampoo gets rid of flakes
customer_reviews.text: What I really liked about this shampoo is that it really washed out all of my hair product in one lather. I wear pomade so sometimes I have to wash my hair twice with other shampoo. The best part about it is that it got rid of my dandruff after first wash. I use it every time I shower and I haven't had the dandruff flakes return.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for dandruff & dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: Really good for dandruff & dry scalp. With me, the product worked better over time and I noticed less and less dandruff the more I used it. Smells amazing too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cayafire

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo.. helps with itchy scalp.. also now ordered some for hubby too and he is using it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Snider

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells even better.
customer_reviews.text: You can feel your scalp tingling and it makes a bunch of lather. Keeps my hair soft and manageable for a good 3 days if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Hammerhead1

customer_reviews.title: Great for your scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have a very dry and sensitive scalp. This shampoo is very gentle yet gets rid of all my dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Baker

customer_reviews.title: Change for the better
customer_reviews.text: Really good change for my dry, curly, short hair.I shampoo on average once a week, using this product leaves my hair softer even right after I wash it than ever before. I'm having to get used to having soft smooth hair!
customer_reviews.author: Singe

customer_reviews.title: Makes my head and hair feel special
customer_reviews.text: Mint & Teetree is awesome and takes daily shampooing to a different level. I really like how little you need to create a great lather. Amazon's "Subscribe and Save" program saves you money as I've seen these at CVS for just under eight dollars. I paid five. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Teatree Mint Shampoo by OGX ~ Pleasant Fragrance and Hydrates.
customer_reviews.text: I love the combination of the tea tree and mint and is refreshing to the scalp as well. I tend to have dry, fine hair and this product has definitely helped in that area. Has a pleasant fragrance which isn't overwhelming. I highly recommend this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Linda In Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nasty- Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this unless you want to feel like you’re washing your hair with toothpaste. I literally used this once and threw it away, which is something I never do. This takes on a peppermint scent rather than a tea tree, tingling minty feel I was hoping for. This was definitely a no for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Gazzara

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo for the first time a few months ago. I was looking for a more natural and less chemically toxic teatree based shampoo. I just bought two more bottles, I love the smell and how smooth it makes my hair feel. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Luxbrands

customer_reviews.title: It has a wonderful smell and I love that it's not a harsh ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a wonderful smell and I love that it's not a harsh shampoo. But it just doesn't "hydrate" as much as the eucalyptus mint shampoo that they produce.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I don't know it's good or not..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because the price is really cheaper than others. Also, the smell is like mint.. (I don't like mint..) It seems like I need to find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Makes for a fresh clean feel to hair. Have used many, many, many bottles of this. I alternate with other shampoos but always enjoy this one.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTTIMOM

customer_reviews.title: Not tea tree
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell or tingle like tea tree or mint shampoo usually does. Just a regular basic shampoo wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Annais

customer_reviews.title: surprising moisture
customer_reviews.text: Bought as my Ophthalmologist recommended for blepheritis/ocular roscea due to tea tree oil, I have blonde highlights/normal hair so was worried about it drying my hair but it lathers up well and leaves my hair well moistured.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Good sensation
customer_reviews.text: Not as moisturizing as I would’ve liked. But I love how clean my hair is and the tingling it leaves on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Maya  Weaver

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo~
customer_reviews.text: I got this shampoo because in colder months I suffer from dry scalp. This shampoo soothes my scalp and makes my hair look fantastic! I also recommend trying their coconut shampoo and conditioner! That is my go to year round!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Robison

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way with this shampoo! Pleasant scent, hair feels clean.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Has a great smell ! And it's recommended by moms at our school to help repel lice from their kids' head when lice is going around. I don't know about that, but if they use this all the time, it's got to get expensive. I'd love to use it all the time but can't afford to (especially with four kids!).

customer_reviews.title: OGX
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say, I got this for my hair bc dry and brittle and sensation scalp. My Husband used it and he has psoriasis and it has been wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Great for natural hair!
customer_reviews.text: Great for natural hair! Felt the tingling after washing and it smells amazing!

customer_reviews.text: Smells minty, but if you're expecting a tingly feel, this doesn't have it.

customer_reviews.text: Strong on the vanilla and not so strong on the tea tree or minty feeling. Get your hair clean but not a fantastic product overall
customer_reviews.author: Jlgvermont

customer_reviews.title: Been using a year and love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a year. It helps keep my hair from getting build up. Great everyday shampoo.

customer_reviews.title: I felt like my hair started falling out while using.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this shampoo until i felt like hair was falling out when drying my hair and instead of making hair moist, i thought it started feeling dry.

customer_reviews.title: It's all I'll use.
customer_reviews.text: For over a year, no more dandruff with no dangerous chemicals, smells good but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Leedy

product_meta.title: OGX Hydrating + Tea Tree Mint Shampoo, 13 Ounce
product_meta.description: Bring balance back to a dry, itchy scalp with OGX Hydrating Tea Tree Mint Shampoo that has a hydrating blend of Australian tea tree oil and soothing peppermint extract to help moisturize and strengthen your hair and scalp. With a lightweight and sulfate-free formula, this refreshing shampoo is a great haircare product for dry and coarse hair, curly hair, frizzy hair and color treated hair types. Apply, wash, rinse and repeat from the scalp to the ends of your hair and follow up your routine with OGX Hydrating Tea Tree Mint Conditioner.
feature_bullets: HELP HYDRATE & NOURISH YOUR HAIR with our shampoo for damaged, oily, & frizzy hair that needs extra moisturizing & nourishing love. Our daily use formula helps to smooth hair, reducing appearance of split ends for a healthy-looking glow

NOURISH & DETANGLE: OGX's Tea Tree Mint formula is for straight hair, curly hair, thick hair, thin hair. Gentle enough for fine hair & fierce enough for thick or coarse hair. Helps to nourish, rejuvenate & detangle hair as it works deep into every strand

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.
REAL QUALITY, REAL BEAUTY: Unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX hair & skin care product collections are here to help you look your best! We’re beauty, pure & simple.
